# /app/loongcollector_3.2.4 --help
loongcollector_3.2.4: Warning: SetUsageMessage() never called

  Flags from /build/loongcollector/app_config/AppConfig.cpp:
    -ALIYUN_LOG_FILE_TAGS (default env file key to load tags) type: string
      default: ""
    -LOONG_FILE_TAGS (default env file key to load tags) type: string
      default: ""
    -_pod_name_ (agent pod name) type: string default: ""
    -app_info_file () type: string default: "app_info.json"
    -buffer_file_path (set buffer dir) type: string default: ""
    -check_point_filename () type: string default: "/tmp/logtail_check_point"
    -check_profile_region () type: bool default: false
    -crash_stack_file_name (crash stack back trace file name) type: string
      default: "backtrace.dat"
    -data_server_port () type: int32 default: 80
    -default_accept_multi_config () type: bool default: false
    -default_buffer_file_num (how many buffer files in default) type: int32
      default: 50
    -default_buffer_file_path (set current execution dir in default)
      type: string default: ""
    -default_env_tag_keys (default env key to load tags) type: string
      default: "ALIYUN_LOG_ENV_TAGS"
    -default_include_config_path () type: string default: "config.d"
    -default_input_flow_control () type: bool default: false
    -default_local_file_size (default size of one buffer file) type: int32
      default: 20971520
    -default_machine_cpu_usage_threshold (machine level) type: double
      default: 0.40000000000000002
    -default_max_sender_queue_extra_buffer_size_bytes (default extra buffer
      size) type: int32 default: 104857600
    -default_oas_connect_timeout (default (minimum) connect timeout for
      OSARequest) type: int32 default: 5
    -default_oas_request_timeout (default (minimum) request timeout for
      OSARequest) type: int32 default: 10
    -default_resource_auto_scale () type: bool default: false
    -default_send_byte_per_sec (the max send speed per sec, replay buffer
      thread) type: int32 default: 2097152
    -host_path_blacklist (host path matches substring in blacklist will be
      ignored) type: string default: ""
    -ilogtail_config_env_name (config file path) type: string
      default: "ALIYUN_LOGTAIL_CONFIG"
    -ilogtail_docker_file_path_config (ilogtail docker path config file)
      type: string default: "docker_path_config.json"
    -inotify_watcher_dirs_dump_filename () type: string
      default: "inotify_watcher_dirs"
    -k8s_meta_service_port (loong collector operator service port) type: int32
      default: 9000
    -k8s_metadata_server_name (loong collector singleton service for k8s
      metadata server) type: string default: "loongcollector-singleton"
    -k8s_metadata_server_port (loong collector singleton service port for k8s
      metadata server) type: int32 default: 8899
    -local_event_data_file_name (local event data file name) type: string
      default: "local_event.json"
    -logtail_mode (logtail mode) type: bool default: true
    -logtail_profile_snapshot (reader profile on local disk) type: string
      default: "logtail_profile_snapshot"
    -logtail_snapshot_dir (snapshot dir on local disk) type: string
      default: "snapshot"
    -logtail_sys_conf_dir (store machine-unique-id, user-defined-id, aliuid)
      type: string default: "/etc/ilogtail/"
    -max_buffer_num (max size) type: int32 default: 40
    -max_holded_data_size (for every id and metric name, the max data size can
      be holded in memory (default 512KB)) type: int32 default: 524288
    -max_multi_config_size (max multi config size) type: int32 default: 20
    -max_open_files_limit (max open files ulimit -n) type: int32
      default: 131072
    -metrics_report_method (method to report metrics (default none, means
      logtail will not report metrics)) type: string default: "sls"
    -operator_service (loong collector operator service) type: string
      default: ""
    -operator_service_port (loong collector operator service port) type: int32
      default: 8888
    -process_thread_count () type: int32 default: 1
    -send_request_concurrency (max count keep in mem when async send)
      type: int32 default: 15
    -sls_observer_ebpf_host_path (the backup real host path for store
      libebpf.so) type: string default: "/etc/ilogtail/ebpf/"

      type: int32 default: 2

      type: int32 default: 15

      sending) type: int32 default: 2000

      default: "ilogtail_config.json"

      be discard) type: int32 default: 43200

      default: true

  Flags from /build/loongcollector/file_server/event_handler/EventHandler.cpp:
    -cookie_timeout_interval (rotate cookie hasn't updated for a long time will
      be removed, seconds) type: int32 default: 1800
    -logreader_count_max (when reader (in one dir) count exceed limit, modify
      handler will remove old reader ) type: int32 default: 100000
    -logreader_count_max_remove_count (remove reader count ) type: int32
      default: 10000
    -logreader_count_maxlimit (when reader (in one dir) count exceed limit,
      reader hasn't updated for 24 hours will be removed) type: int32
      default: 10000
    -logreader_count_upperlimit (when reader (in one dir) count exceed limit,
      reader hasn't updated for 7 * 24 hours will be removed) type: int32
      default: 5000
    -logreader_filedeleted_remove_interval (when file is deleted, reader will
      be removed after seconds) type: int32 default: 900
    -logreader_filerotate_remove_interval (when file is rotate, reader will be
      removed after seconds) type: int32 default: 600
    -logreader_timeout_interval (reader hasn't updated for a long time will be
      removed, seconds) type: int32 default: 1728000000
    -read_file_time_slice (microseconds) type: int64 default: 25000
    -rotate_overflow_error_interval (second) type: int32 default: 60

  Flags from /build/loongcollector/file_server/polling/PollingDirFile.cpp:
    -check_not_exist_file_dir_round (clear not exist file dir cache, round)
      type: int32 default: 20
    -delete_dir_file_round (delete not exist file dir, round) type: int32
      default: 100
    -dirfile_check_interval_ms (dir file check interval, ms) type: int32
      default: 5000
    -dirfile_stat_count (sleep when dir file stat count up to) type: int32
      default: 100
    -dirfile_stat_sleep (sleep time when dir file stat up to 1000, ms)
      type: int32 default: 30
    -polling_check_timeout_interval ( ) type: int32 default: 600
    -polling_dir_first_watch_timeout (do not post event if modify time is up
      to) type: int32 default: 10800
    -polling_dir_timeout (remove unchanged dir if modify time is older than
      time) type: int32 default: 43200
    -polling_dir_upperlimit (try to remove unchanged dir if dir count is up to)
      type: int32 default: 500000
    -polling_file_first_watch_timeout (do not post event if modify time is up
      to) type: int32 default: 10800
    -polling_file_timeout (remove unchanged file if modify time is older than
      time) type: int32 default: 43200
    -polling_file_upperlimit (try to remove unchanged file if file count is up
      to) type: int32 default: 500000
    -polling_max_stat_count (max stat count in each round) type: int32
      default: 1000000
    -polling_max_stat_count_per_config (max stat count per config in each
      round) type: int32 default: 100000
    -polling_max_stat_count_per_dir (max stat count per dir in each round)
      type: int32 default: 100000
    -polling_modify_repush_interval (polling modify event repush interval,
      seconds) type: int32 default: 10

    -max_polling_event_queue_size (max polling event queue size) type: int32
      default: 10000

  Flags from /build/loongcollector/file_server/polling/PollingModify.cpp:
    -ignore_file_modify_timeout (if file modify time is up to XXX seconds,
      ignore it) type: int32 default: 180
    -modify_cache_make_space_interval (second) type: int32 default: 600
    -modify_cache_max (max modify cache size, if exceed, delete 0.2 oldest)
      type: int32 default: 100000
    -modify_check_interval (modify check interval ms) type: int32 default: 1000
    -modify_stat_count (sleep when dir file stat count up to) type: int32
      default: 100
    -modify_stat_sleepMs (sleep time when dir file stat up to 1000, ms)
      type: int32 default: 10



  Flags from /build/loongcollector/file_server/reader/FileReaderOptions.cpp:
    -default_reader_flush_timeout () type: int32 default: 60
    -default_tail_limit_kb (when first open file, if offset little than this
      value, move offset to beginning, KB) type: int32 default: 1024
    -delay_bytes_upperlimit (if (total_file_size - current_readed_size) exceed
      upperlimit, send READ_LOG_DELAY_ALARM, bytes) type: int32
      default: 209715200
    -logreader_max_rotate_queue_size () type: int32 default: 20

  Flags from /mag/workspace/sls-sql-velox/presto-native-execution/velox/velox/expression/Expr.cpp:
    -force_eval_simplified (Whether to overwrite queryCtx and force the use of
      simplified expression evaluation path.) type: bool default: false
    -velox_experimental_save_input_on_fatal_signal (This is an experimental
      flag only to be used for debugging purposes. If set to true, serializes
      the input vector data and all the SQL expressions in the ExprSet that is
      currently executing, whenever a fatal signal is encountered. Enabling
      this flag makes the signal handler async signal unsafe, so it should only
      be used for debugging purposes. The vector and SQLs are serialized to
      files in directories specified by either
      'velox_save_input_on_expression_any_failure_path' or
      'velox_save_input_on_expression_system_failure_path') type: bool
      default: false



  Flags from /mag/workspace/sls-sql-velox/presto-native-execution/velox/velox/flag_definitions/flags.cpp:
    -avx2 (Enables use of AVX2 when available) type: bool default: true
    -bmi2 (Enables use of BMI2 when available) type: bool default: true
    -duckdb_preserve_identifier_case (Duckdb parser preseve identifier case)
      type: bool default: false
    -velox_enable_memory_usage_track_in_default_memory_pool (If true, enable
      memory usage tracking in the default memory pool) type: bool
      default: false
    -velox_exception_system_stacktrace_enabled (Enable the stacktrace for
      system type of VeloxException) type: bool default: true
    -velox_exception_system_stacktrace_rate_limit_ms (Min time interval in
      milliseconds between stack traces captured in system type of
      VeloxException; off when set to 0 (the default)) type: int32 default: 0
    -velox_exception_user_stacktrace_enabled (Enable the stacktrace for user
      type of VeloxException) type: bool default: false
    -velox_exception_user_stacktrace_rate_limit_ms (Min time interval in
      milliseconds between stack traces captured in user type of
      VeloxException; off when set to 0 (the default)) type: int32 default: 0
    -velox_memory_leak_check_enabled (If true, check fails on any memory leaks
      in memory pool and memory manager) type: bool default: false
    -velox_memory_num_shared_leaf_pools (Number of shared leaf memory pools per
      process) type: int32 default: 32
    -velox_memory_pool_debug_enabled (If true, 'MemoryPool' will be running in
      debug mode to track the allocation and free call sites to detect the
      source of memory leak for testing purpose) type: bool default: false
    -velox_memory_use_hugepages (Use explicit huge pages) type: bool
      default: false
    -velox_save_input_on_expression_any_failure_path (Enable saving input
      vector and expression SQL on any failure during expression evaluation.
      Specifies the directory to use for storing the vectors and expression SQL
      strings.) type: string default: ""
    -velox_save_input_on_expression_system_failure_path (Enable saving input
      vector and expression SQL on system failure during expression evaluation.
      Specifies the directory to use for storing the vectors and expression SQL
      strings. This flag is ignored if
      velox_save_input_on_expression_any_failure_path is set.) type: string
      default: ""
    -velox_suppress_memory_capacity_exceeding_error_message (If true, suppress
      the verbose error message in memory capacity exceeded exception. This is
      only used by test to control the test error output size) type: bool
      default: false
    -velox_time_allocations (Record time and volume for large allocation/free)
      type: bool default: false

      type: bool default: false currently: true
    -helpfull (show help on all flags -- same as -help) type: bool
      default: false

      type: string default: ""

      default: ""

      default: false

      default: false
